courses.title: PHP Web Development
courses.details: Learn the basics and advanced concepts of PHP, a popular scripting language for web development. This course covers everything from basic syntax to advanced topics like object-oriented programming and MySQL integration.

courses.title: C++ Programming
courses.details: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to C++ programming. It covers fundamental programming concepts, data structures, algorithms, and more, making it ideal for beginners and experienced programmers alike.

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript
courses.details: Master JavaScript with this advanced course. Explore topics such as ES6+ features, asynchronous programming, and front-end frameworks like React and Angular.

courses.title: Introduction to Figma
courses.details: Learn the basics of Figma, a powerful design tool used for creating user interfaces and web designs. This course covers essential features, collaborative design techniques, and how to create effective UI/UX designs.
